title: The Richard Sherman Podcast - Week 7 Reaction: Chiefs-49ers, Seahawks & Cowboys wins, Bucs & Packers losses
itunes:title: The Richard Sherman Podcast - Week 7 Reaction: Chiefs-49ers, Seahawks & Cowboys wins, Bucs & Packers losses
description:
Richard Sherman reacts to the Kansas City Chiefs & Patrick Mahomes spoiling Christian McCaffrey's debut with the San Francisco 49ers, how the Seattle Seahawks found themselves leading the NFC West after their win over Justin Herbert & the Los Angeles Chargers, Tom Brady & Aaron Rodgers falling below .500 & if either the Tampa Bay Buccaneers or the Green Bay Packers can recover, and whether Dak Prescott returning to the Dallas Cowboys makes them an elite team in the NFL. #volume #herd #colincowherd

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
